title: Draft Website Terms of Service
description: An in-house counsel needs to draft the Terms of Service (ToS) for a new software-as-a-service (SaaS) product.

tasks.description: Review the product's functionality to understand the service being offered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands what the SaaS product does.

tasks.description: Select a ToS template appropriate for a SaaS product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts with a relevant template.

tasks.description: Draft key clauses, including user license grants, acceptable use policies, disclaimer of warranties, and limitation of liability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a comprehensive ToS that protects the company.
